**Labels**: `new-epic`, `P[0-2]`, `run:[run]`, `track:[track]`, `review:[source]`

## Estimated Scope

- Issues: [N]
- Track: [A/B/C/D]
- Target milestone: [M-N]
- Story points: [N, if estimation has been done — omit if premature]

## Dependencies

- Depends on: [list of epics that must exist first]

[Does this epic reuse shared primitives from other epics? Which ones? Omit if none identified yet.]
